value:
Let us ensure all can enjoy the
festivities. I would like to personally
chat with each attendee one-on-one.

I may be king, but it has been long
since I have donned clothing like this,
as I must always be ready for battle.

To a casual observer, dancing seems
effortless. But, it requires discipline
similar to a knight's formal training.

I could go for one more waltz.
Would you fancy joining me on the
dance floor, $Nu?

A waltz, you say? That reminds me of
days gone by when I was forced to
dance with my sister for them...

I am Eldigan, Lord of Nordion. I have
a formal request for you to attend the
ball held by $Nf.

What did you expect? The real
performance shall begin at once.

It seems I have finally warmed up.
That being said, shall we have
another dance?

My coordination seems to be off.
If this continues then...

I give my thanks. Now I can continue
dancing until dawn. Haha, I am
only joking.

I am Eldigan, present in response
to your invitation. Do not think my
talent lies in swordsmanship alone.

Your expression tells me that you
have an affinity for Nordion culture,
especially the food and music.$k$pI see similarities to my own country
here. Festivities know no borders,
regardless of the language.$k$pSeeing a tranquil gathering such
as this gives me joy greater than
that of a victory on the battlefield.$k$pAs the Lionheart, protecting people
and ensuring harmony are my prime
reasons to fight, after all...$k$pAlthough war presses on, I hope that
peace finds this world someday. Then
we can hold another magnificent ball.
てやっ
I'll stop you!
ぐあっ…
I was careless...
Let me show you.
Enjoying yourself?
One last dance...
We shall share this dance!
The tune yet plays...
Hmm...
Let us dance.
Maintain composure.
I am Eldigan, Lord of Nordion. I would like you to join me in a dance.
This brings back memories... My sister and I often danced together, to work on our steps.
Festivals are important for lifting the spirits of the citizenry... They aren't so bad, are they?
Lachesis, I would never leave you alone. I will not die. I vow to return to your side.
If you are unskilled at dancing, allow me to teach you. Here — give me your hand.
Understood.
Do you think so?
What fine music.
